remarks: Lemma for ~ divalg .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Mar-2011.)
statement:
divalglem8.1 $e |- N e. ZZ $.
divalglem8.2 $e |- D e. ZZ $.
divalglem8.3 $e |- D =/= 0 $.
divalglem8.4 $e |- S = { r e. NN0 | D || ( N - r ) } $.
divalglem8 $p |- ( ( ( X e. S /\ Y e. S ) /\ ( X < ( abs ` D ) /\ Y < ( abs ` D ) ) ) -> ( K e. ZZ -> ( ( K x. ( abs ` D ) ) = ( Y - X ) -> X = Y ) ) ) $.
$d D r $.
$d N r $.
